results.name: Iron Fist (USM)
results.description:
Danny is always focused yet relaxed - more Zen-focused than chill surfer dude. But when Danny turns into Iron First, he becomes very rigid with perfect posture. A very Yin/Yang character. 

Danny is THE Danny Rand â€“ the 17-year-old head of the giant Rand Corporation.  His wealth rivals Osbornâ€™s â€“ but youâ€™d never know it from his laid- back attitude. However, as Iron Fist, he takes his powers very seriously. 

While Danny and Luke are best friends, Danny has a special respect for Spider-Man, acting as a non-judgmental moral commentator on all of Spider-Manâ€™s actions.

results.name: Iron Man
results.description: Wounded, captured and forced to build a weapon by his enemies, billionaire industrialist Tony Stark instead created an advanced suit of armor to save his life and escape captivity. Now with a new outlook on life, Tony uses his money and intelligence to make the world a safer, better place as Iron Man.

results.name: Iron Man/Tony Stark (MAA)
results.description: Tony Stark is the genius inventor/billionaire/philanthropist owner of Stark Industries. With his super high-tech Iron Man suit, he is practically indestructible, able to fly, and has a large selection of weapons to choose from - but it's Tony's quick thinking and ability to adapt and improvise that make him an effective leader of the Avengers.

results.name: Iron Patriot (James Rhodes)
results.description: U.S. Air Force pilot and Tony Stark's friend who has his own suit of Iron Man armor, nicknamed, "War Machine."
